level.heading: Temporary license, registration, or certification.
level.text: A board may issue a temporary license, registration, or certification to an applicant for a fixed period of time, under conditions prescribed by the Mayor through rulemaking, who is licensed, registered, or certified and in good standing to practice in another jurisdiction.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2(e)(9) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-26
level.text: For Law 18-26, see notes following ยง 3-1201.01.
